full_text:
IN THE COURT OF THE JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF THE FIRST CLASS- III
THIRUVANANTHAPURAM
Smt. Swetha Sasikumar
Judicial Magistrate of the First Class- IV
(in-charge of Judicial Magistrate of First Class -ITT)
Tuesday 25" day of February 2025
CC. No. 784/2019
Complainant : State represented by the Sub Inspector police, Cantonment
police station (Crime No. 431/2018).
(By Asst. Public Prosecutor)
Accused 1 : Shanavas, aged 27/18 years, S/o Abdul Vahid, Flat No. 133,
Rajaji Nagar, Thampanoor ward, Thycaud village.
2 : Manu, aged 33/18 years, S/o Maniyan, Flat No. 559, Rajaji
Nagar, Thampanoor ward, Thycaud village.
5 : Sarath, aged 33/18 years, S/o Joy, Flat No. 654, Rajaji Nagar,
Thampanoor ward, Thycaud village.
Offences : U/Ss. 120(H and 118(a) of Kerala Police Act.
Order : Accused no. 5 is convicted and sentenced to pay fine of
Rs.1,000/- for the offence punishable u/s. 120(f) of Kerala
Police Act. In default of payment of fine, accused shall
undergo simple imprisonment for a period of 2 days and
accused no. 5 is convicted and sentenced to pay fine of
Rs.100/- for the offence punishable u/s. 118(a) of Kerala
Police Act. In default of payment of fine, accused shall
undergo simple imprisonment for a period of 2 days Case
against accused no. 1 and 2 is refiled as CC.432/2025.
Heard, perused the records and passed the following:
JUDGMENT
1. This case has arisen on a final report filed by the Sub Inspector of Police, Cantonment
Police Station in crime No. 431/18 alleging the commission of offences against the
accused under Sections 120(f) and 118(a) of Kerala Police Act.

2. Accused no. 5 pleaded guilty. Charge was framed under Sections 120(f) and
118(a) of Kerala Police Act was read over and explained to the accused and he
pleaded guilty. This court is convinced that the plea of the accused is voluntary.
Hence his plea is accepted. The accused no. 5 is found guilty for the
offences u/ss. 120(f) and 118(a) of Kerala Police Act and he is convicted
thereunder.

3. Accused no. 5 is convicted and sentenced to pay fine of Rs.1,000/- for the
offence punishable u/s. 120(f) of Kerala Police Act. In default of payment of
fine, accused shall undergo simple imprisonment for a period of 2 days and
accused no. 5 is convicted and sentenced to pay fine of Rs.100/- for the offence
punishable u/s. 118(a) of Kerala Police Act. In default of payment of fine,
accused shall undergo simple imprisonment for a period of 2 days Case against
accused no. 1 and 2 is refiled as CC.432/2025.

( Dictated to the Confidential Assistant, transcribed and typed by her, corrected and
pronounced by me, in open court, on this the 25" day of February, 2025.)
Judicial Magistrate of the First Class- TV(I/C)
Thiruvananthapuram
